fields.name: certFile
fields.description: A file containing the certificate

fields.name: keyFile
fields.description: A file containing the private key

fields.name: keyPassword
fields.description: Password of the private key if it is encrypted

records.name: CertKey
records.description: Represents a combination of certificate, private key, and private key password if encrypted.

fields.name: connectionConfig
fields.description: The related connection configuration

fields.name: willDetails
fields.description: The configurations related to the last will message of the client

records.name: ClientConfiguration
records.description: The configurations related to the client initialization.

fields.name: username
fields.description: The username to use for the connection

fields.name: password
fields.description: The password to use for the connection

fields.name: secureSocket
fields.description: The configurations related to secure communication with the MQTT server

fields.name: maxReconnectDelay
fields.description: The maximum delay between reconnects in milliseconds

fields.name: keepAliveInterval
fields.description: The maximum time interval between messages sent or received in seconds

fields.name: connectionTimeout
fields.description: Maximum time interval in seconds the client will wait for the network connection to the MQTT server to be established

fields.name: cleanStart
fields.description: Whether the client and server should remember state for the client across reconnects

fields.name: serverUris
fields.description: List of serverURIs the client may connect to

fields.name: automaticReconnect
fields.description: Whether the client will automatically attempt to reconnect to the server if the connection is lost

records.name: ConnectionConfiguration
records.description: The configurations related to the connection initialization of `mqtt:Client` and `mqtt:Listener`.

fields.name: messageId
fields.description: Message ID of the message that was delivered

fields.name: topic
fields.description: Topic for the message that was delivered

records.name: DeliveryToken
records.description: The mechanism for tracking the delivery of a message

fields.name: reasonCode
fields.description: The reason code for the error

records.name: ErrorDetails
records.description: The error details type for the module.

fields.name: connectionConfig
fields.description: The related connection configuration

fields.name: manualAcks
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the client should automatically ack messages

records.name: ListenerConfiguration
records.description: The configurations related to the listener initialization.

fields.name: payload
fields.description: The payload of the message as a byte array

fields.name: qos
fields.description: Quality of service. 0 - at most once, 1 - at least once, 2 - exactly once

fields.name: retained
fields.description: Indicates whether this message should/is retained by the server

fields.name: duplicate
fields.description: Indicates whether or not this message might be a duplicate

fields.name: messageId
fields.description: The message ID of the message. This is only set on messages received from the server

fields.name: topic
fields.description: The topic this message was received on. This is only set on messages received from the server

fields.name: properties
fields.description: The properties of the message

records.name: Message
records.description: An MQTT message holds the application payload and other metadata.

fields.name: responseTopic
fields.description: The topic to send the response to in reqeust response scenario

fields.name: correlationData
fields.description: The correlation data to uniquely identify the message

records.name: MessageProperties
records.description: Properties of an MQTT message.

fields.name: cert
fields.description: Certificate file that the client trusts or a `crypto:TrustStore`

fields.name: key
fields.description: Combination of certificate and private key of the client or a `crypto:KeyStore`

fields.name: protocol
fields.description: Related protocol

records.name: SecureSocket
records.description: Configurations for secure communication with the MQTT server.

fields.name: topic
fields.description: The topic to subscribe to

fields.name: qos
fields.description: The QoS level to subscribe at

records.name: Subscription
records.description: An MQTTSubscription which contains the topic and the QoS level.

fields.name: willMessage
fields.description: The last will message to be sent to the subscribers

fields.name: destinationTopic
fields.description: The topic to publish the last will message

records.name: WillDetails
records.description: The configurations related to the last will message of the client.

returnParameters.description: `mqtt:Error` if the message cannot be completed or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: complete
remoteMethods.description:
Completes the received message.
```ballerina
check caller->complete();
```

parameters.name: response
parameters.description: The response message to be sent

returnParameters.description: `mqtt:Error` if the message cannot be sent or `()`

remoteMethods.name: respond
remoteMethods.description:
Send the response for the request message.
```ballerina
check caller->respond({payload: "Hello Response".toBytes()});
```

returnParameters.description: `mqtt:Error` if the message cannot be completed or else `()`

methods.name: complete
methods.description:
Completes the received message.
```ballerina
check caller->complete();
```

parameters.name: response
parameters.description: The response message to be sent

returnParameters.description: `mqtt:Error` if the message cannot be sent or `()`

methods.name: respond

Send the response for the request message.

clients.name: Caller
clients.description: Represents the client that is used to complete received messages.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Topic to publish the message to

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Message to publish

returnParameters.description: `mqtt:DeliveryToken` or else `mqtt:Error` if an error occurs while publishing

remoteMethods.name: publish
remoteMethods.description:
Publishes a message to a topic.
```ballerina
mqtt:DeliveryToken token = check 'client->publish("mqtt/topic", message);
```

parameters.name: subscriptions
parameters.description: The topics to be subscribed to

returnParameters.description: `mqtt:Error` if an error occurs while subscribing or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: subscribe
remoteMethods.description:
Subscribes to a given topic in the request response scenario.
```ballerina
check 'client->subscribe([{topic: "mqtt/topic1", qos: 0}, {topic: "mqtt/topic2", qos: 1}]);
```

parameters.name: T
parameters.description: Type of the stream to return

returnParameters.description: `stream<Message, error?>` or else`mqtt:Error` if an error occurs while receiving the response

remoteMethods.name: receive
remoteMethods.description:
Receives messages from the server.
```ballerina
stream<mqtt:Message, error?> responseStream = check 'client->receive();
```

returnParameters.description: `mqtt:Error` if an error occurs while closing or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: close
remoteMethods.description:
Closes the connection to the server.
```ballerina
check 'client->close();
```

returnParameters.description: `true` if the client is connected, `mqtt:Error` if an error occurs in the process

remoteMethods.name: isConnected
remoteMethods.description:
Checks if the client is connected to the server.
```ballerina
boolean isConnected = check 'client->isConnected;
```

returnParameters.description: `mqtt:Error` if an error occurs while disconnecting or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: disconnect
remoteMethods.description:
Disconnects the client from the server.
```ballerina
check 'client->disconnect();
```

returnParameters.description: `mqtt:Error` if an error occurs while reconnecting or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: reconnect
remoteMethods.description:
Reconnects the client to the server.
```ballerina
check 'client->reconnect();
```

parameters.description: URI of the server to connect to

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the client

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Optional configuration values to use for the client

returnParameters.description: `mqtt:Error` if an error occurs while creating the client or else `()`

```ballerina
mqtt:Client 'client = check new(mqtt:DEFAULT_URL, "client-unique-id");
```

clients.name: Client

parameters.name: 'service
parameters.description: The service to be attached

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the service

returnParameters.description: A `error` if an error is encountered while attaching the service or else `()`

lifeCycleMethods.name: attach
lifeCycleMethods.description:
Attaches a service to the listener.
```ballerina
mqtt:Error? result = 'listener.attach(mqttService);
```

parameters.name: serverUri
parameters.description: The URI of the remote MQTT server

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: The unique client ID to identify the listener

parameters.name: subscriptions
parameters.description: The topics to be subscribed to

returnParameters.description: `mqtt:Error` if an error occurs while creating the listener or else `()`

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Creates a new `mqtt:Listener`.
```ballerina
mqtt:Listener 'listener = check new(mqtt:DEFAULT_URL, "listener-unique-id", "mqtt/topic");
```

returnParameters.description: A `error` if an error is encountered while starting the server or else `()`

methods.name: 'start
methods.description:
Starts the registered services.
```ballerina
mqtt:Error? result = 'listener.'start();
```

returnParameters.description: A `error` if an error is encountered during the listener-stopping process or else `()`

methods.name: gracefulStop
methods.description:
Stops the MQTT listener gracefully.
```ballerina
mqtt:Error? result = 'listener.gracefulStop();
```

returnParameters.description: A `error` if an error is encountered during the listener-stopping process or else `()`

methods.name: immediateStop
methods.description:
Stops the mqtt listener immediately.
```ballerina
mqtt:Error? result = 'listener.immediateStop();
```

parameters.name: 'service
parameters.description: The service to be attached

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the service

returnParameters.description: A `error` if an error is encountered while attaching the service or else `()`

methods.name: attach
methods.description:
Attaches a service to the listener.
```ballerina
mqtt:Error? result = 'listener.attach(mqttService);
```

parameters.name: 'service
parameters.description: The service to be detached

returnParameters.description: A `error` if an error is encountered while detaching a service or else `()`

methods.name: detach
methods.description:
Detaches a consumer service from the listener.
```ballerina
mqtt:Error? result = 'listener.detach(mqttService);
```
